channel.title: [Survival] [PvP] Phoenix Beta Servers! [Creative]
channel.description:
PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU WILL NEED AN ENJIN ACCOUNT TO REGISTER ON OUR FORUMS!!
The Phoenix Servers are new servers that have not been released yet even to private users. However, we will be opening a beta testing version of two of our three servers on Saturday April 21st. To sign up for the beta server you will need to go here: www.phoenixproject.enjin.com. You'll need to sign up for an enjin account and click the "Join Website" after logging in (located in the top left corner of the screen). The two servers that we will be releasing are our PvP/Raid server and our Build/Main server the Creative beta server will be released on June 8th. You will need to post on the "Beta Testing!" Forum thread, answering all of the required questions there. Here are the perks for joining us in the "Beta" server:
- You will get the donation rank perks of $10
We will be posting more on the forums here: www.phoenixproject.enjin.com/forum.
Thanks for reading, Sincerely yours Supermedinita And Tayden.
Additional information: www.phoenixproject.enjin.com Post anything you need help with on this server topic!

item.title: [Survival] [PvP] Phoenix Beta Servers! [Creative]
item.dc:creator: @phoenixservers phoenixservers
item.description:
@phoenixservers wrote:

PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU WILL NEED AN ENJIN ACCOUNT TO REGISTER ON OUR FORUMS!!

The Phoenix Servers are new servers that have not been released yet even to private users. However, we will be opening a beta testing version of two of our three servers on Saturday April 21st. To sign up for the beta server you will need to go here: www.phoenixproject.enjin.com. You’ll need to sign up for an enjin account and click the “Join Website” after logging in (located in the top left corner of the screen). The two servers that we will be releasing are our PvP/Raid server and our Build/Main server the Creative beta server will be released on June 8th. You will need to post on the “Beta Testing!” Forum thread, answering all of the required questions there. Here are the perks for joining us in the “Beta” server:

  • You will get the donation rank perks of $10

We will be posting more on the forums here: www.phoenixproject.enjin.com/forum.

Thanks for reading, Sincerely yours
Supermedinita And Tayden.

Additional information: www.phoenixproject.enjin.com
